description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Step into the strange world of the Labyrinth as Amelia, a young woman with no memories of who she is, or why she is trapped here. All she knows is that she must travel deeper, towards the tall Black Tower. She will learn that even darker secrets await her in the deeper layers of the Labyrinth.  She wants to escape and regain her memories, but the Labyrinth is more than just a maze.
